meanings.sent1: The new water bottle is leakless, so you won't have any spills.
meanings.sent2: She bought a leakless container to store her soup without any mess.
meanings.sent3: The leakless roof kept the rain out, much to the relief of the residents.
meanings.sent4: His leakless plan ensured that no information would escape.
meanings.sent5: The leakless bucket was a lifesaver during the flood, keeping everything dry.

meanings.sent5: The leakless container was ideal for transporting liquids without any spills.
